doc.title: 21st Century Terror
doc.plot: Ten part series on terrorism focusing on Islamic extremism from its early roots through the current conflict with the West. Two of the 10 parts are taken from earlier run theatrically released documentary 'Inside 9/11,' screened again with 8 new documentary hours as part of National Geographic "Terrorism Week: Reign of Terror: Al Qaeda and the World Islamic Front for Jihad"
